BlackFortress defences/Kali::

The blackfortress defences continue to shot against Lunarpine; Kali 
was checking the computer, looking for the intruders and she saw 
thanks at the video camera that Ender was doing a deal with the 
intruders, she pressed several buttons and advice to Shivah, while 
she was telling hin what was going on all the doors, where Ender and 
the intruder were, closed and locked down -that doors had been made 
in that way that a normal weapon couldn't damage them. In the top of 
the room appeared several weapons and they started to shot against 
the mutants and ender.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        "I want to get out of this base.  They don't appreciate my 
usefulness 
> here.  I'll help you get out if you'll let me work with your 
group."  He 
> stands perfectly still across the hall.
